variants.Description in input context: This variant results in a premature stop codon, causing a truncated protein.

Material used.Material Source: HEK293 cells transfected with the variant and wild-type GPC1 plasmids

Readout description.Result Description: The truncated protein was not detected in the sample containing the variant, while the wild-type protein was expressed at normal levels.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type GPC1 plasmid was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: No negative control was mentioned in the literature.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal protein expression should be detected.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Absence of the truncated protein is indicative of an abnormal result.
